revdescription.para: Subject-matter experts' contributions added
Formatting fixes, some proofreading
Extensive restructuring and clarifying
Updates to configuration information for Mongo, ingestion, portal. Added ops tools.
Completed final revisions.
Additions throughout to clarify deployment steps.
Post-Alpha editing pass. Defects logged.
Added section on the portal; updated ingestion related content throughout, including adding a new image to help clarify that content.
Updated a command in the deploy services section.
Updates throughout to address additional defects.
Updated instructions for installing and configuring the portal.
Included new and changed configuration properties. DE1419.
Included new configuration properties for sandbox mode and redundant MQ. DE1267.
Updated Ops Tools. DE1396
Updated the Sample Application Installation section. DE1395
Updated the Portal Installation Section. DE1394
Updated the Portal Configuration Section. DE1409
Updated Ingestion Configuration. DE1409.
Updated MongoDB instructions for setting up the data store with instructions for indexing databases. DE1464
Added preparation section to define sandbox and production modes, and added tips to aid readers in identifying content specific to sandbox mode.
Added information on the OpenLDAP olcSizeLimit parameter. DE1480.
Added a configuration change to the reset password lifespan value. DE1487.
Added information on updating the ActiveMQ settings. DE1479.
Added Ingestion Configuration Changes for ActiveMQ settings. DE1455.
Extensive revisions for the Portal installation and configuration content. DE1462
Added a chapter describing administrator account creation. Part of US3415
Added a chapter describing how to handle application registration requests. Part of US3415
Added data ingestion instructions and reference, previously included in the admin guide. DE1512
Added two chapters that describe security event notifications and security event logs. Part of US3415
Added a chapter on approving developer accounts in production. Part of DE1503
Added a chapter on resetting an environment. DE1465
Added a section to the ingestion chapter on implementing the CPSI environment in Amazon Web Services. See DE1519.

Revised network preparation and assumptions and supporting information for SimpleIDP to clarify that identity providers between the &PRODUCTABBR; and education organizations don't require a direct connection. See DE1502 for more information.
Added a line to ingestion configuration about the total number of retries on a mongo operation. See DE1594.
Updated the sli.properties file in the configuration section for the portal. See DE1585.
Added a new section on cookies and proxying. See DE1570.
Added instructions on resetting an environment during deployment. See DE1568.
Added a section on blocking search engine web bot indexing. See DE1496.
Added a step on deleting directory contents to the instructions for resetting an environment. See DE1621.
Removed the data ingestion section. This is part of DE1617.
Added a step to the instructions on resetting an environment. See DE1623.
Added a line in the sli.properties file in the ingestion configuration section to cover the queueURI. Also, added a line to the same file for the sample data set location. See DE1622 and DE1607.
Added a parameter to the sli.properties file in the Setting up ActiveMQ section. See DE1267.
Added SLI architecture chapter featuring a diagram.
Added information on encrypting the client_id and client_secret for portal and dashboard config. See DE1660.
Updated the command to release the tenant job lock in the ingestion section. See DE1643.
Updated a URL in the ActiveMQ section. See DE1684.
Changed sli.sandbox.autoRegisterApps property to sli.autoRegisterApps. Added details relating to the property. See DE1515.

Added information on administrative emails for developer registration requests, application approval requests, and security event notifications. Added instructions on how to permanently delete and temporarily disable administrative users. Added a screenshot for the application registration approval page. See DE1617 for more details.
Added a section on roles and LDAP groups. See DE1690 for details.
Removed references to event notifications that have not been implemented. Also, Clarified what is available in the security logs using the API. See DE413 for details.
Added a section to describe updating Mongo to version 2.2. See US3964.
Added a section to describe using the AAMT to add administrative users. See US4342.
Added timeout configurations for ingestion. See DE1761.
Added information about the sli-shard-presplit.js script and current Mongo functionality to the MongoDB section. See DE1817.
Updated runbook version numbering to match current code release version number. From henceforth, each revision number will match the code release number.
Removed teacher_stamper information from Ops Tools section. See DE1843
Replaced the ingestion configuration block text in order with text that reflects Multiple Maestros. See DE1841
Added a note to indicate that a non-manager account must be used for all interaction between the software and the LDAP directory. See DE1840
Added portal url to Databrowser Installation section. See DE1838
Improved Apache Tomcat installation documentation. See DE1836
Added keyencoding property to the configuration sections for Ingestion, SimpleIDP, and REST API. See DE1869
Added commands to disable flow control for ActiveMQ. See DE1881.
Added information to setup redundancy for ActiveMQ. See DE1929.
Added a warning about a bug in nss-pam-ldapd . See DE1913.
Added sli.simple-idp.sandbox.users to the Simple IDP Configuration Properties table. See DE2001.
Updated information on ProFTPD and ActiveMQ in several sections. See DE2057 for more information.
Updated instructions on the deploying the admin application and the dashboard. The new instructions include several steps on generating plain-text key files. See DE1982 for more information.
Updated instructions for releasing ingestion tenant onboarding lock. See DE2065 for more information.
Added sli.security.in_clause_size propery and information on 413 response codes. See DE1922 for more information.
Removed references to the ed_org stamper. See DE2199 for more information.
Added information to generate the key and encrypt the LDAP password. See DE2171
Added section for rebalancing sandbox. See US4889.
Added step to generate encrypted SMTP password. See DE2166.
Changed sli.ingestion.warningsCountPerInterchange and sli.ingestion.errors CountPerInterchange to 10000. See DE2206.
Added scaling information. See US4877
Removing invalid steps for databrower installation. See DE2224
Removed is_indexes.js related information. See DE2124.
Removed reference to sli.ingestion.tenant.deriveTenants. See US4833.
Added "Sandbox Administrator" to sli.role.admin. See DE2269.
Added PathAllowFilter directive. See DE1071.
Replaced second paragraph of the MongoDB section of Deploy Platform: Data Stores. See DE2281.
Added a new section about index validation in the ingestion server ("Index Validation"). See DE2326
Added information that Tomcat must run as root during ingestion to the Deploy SLI Services: Ingestion section. See DE2291.
Added notes to the Creating Administrator Accounts section that indicate that the initial account that is created for a district must be an SEA Admin. See DE2297.
Added search-related properties to the REST API: Configuration section. See DE2340.
Added SARJE information to the Deploy Platform: Messaging Queue section and deleted redundant steps. See DE2337.
Added Deploy SLI Services: Search Indexer section. See DE2334.
Added Deploy SLI Services: SARJE section. See DE2335.
Added deployment warning for Java applications. See DE2276.
Added Deploy Platform: Elasticsearch section. See DE2223 for more information.]
Merged and condensed architecture information in planning chapter and updated images to include the search index features. See DE2338.
Added step 5 to Portal Installation task. See DE2387.
Added Java parameters to configure the Java garbage collector to the Ingestion: Configuration section. See DE2399.
Removed Handling Developer Account Creation Requests in Production Mode. Developers now log in using their Sandbox credentials. See US5089.
Updated to include unified account information. See US2304.
Added section on how to reset the end user license agreement. See DE2028.
Removed various ingestion properties. See DE2408.
Updated sli.search.embedded related information. See DE2446.

Removed directions to run component level automated suites (except for apiAndSecurityTests). Also added information on running the new end-to-end test suite for smoke testing the configuration of a new staging environment. See DE2420.
Updated broker url information for elasticsearch. See DE2475.
Updated search indexer configuration property defaults and descriptions. See DE2468.
Updated admin tool and API configuration to reflect inBloom configuration changes. See DE2469.
Use correct case for Data Store. See US5182.
Updated links to reflect new brand and website See US5113.
Added additional settings for MongoDB. See US5230.
Additional link and configuration updates for rebranding. See DE2494.
Removed .ctl file information from Setting up the Landing Zone Servers. See DE2505.
Added sli.ingestion.queue.parser values to ingestion configuration. See DE2518.
Removed Creating Administrative Users with LDAP section. See DE2514.
Removed sli.mongodb.port property and updated sli.mongodb.host property. See DE2535.
Updated search indexer installation configuration code. See DE2534.
Added ldap_use_ssl to the Admin Tools Installation configuration example. See DE2270.
Added Adjusting Session Timeouts to the Deploy Services section. See DE1749.
Added note to detail SimpleIDP capabilities. See DE2594.
Added a warning regarding the grace period to the API Configuration section. The grace period must be set to 0 before the public accesses Production data. See DE2592.
Added contextual information to support the operator's understanding of unified developer accounts. See DE2604.
Added ulimit configuration requirements for acceptance testing. See DE2611.
Added information about mitigating click-jacking to Preparations & Assumptions: Security. See DE2295.
Repaired table layouts throughout where text had been overlapping across cells.
Added information for limiting upload sizes for entities that are created or updated through the API. See DE2668.
Added information to clarify bootstrap instructions for additional applications. See DE2639.
Added sli.ingestion.parser.batch.size property to the Ingestion Configuration properties. See DE2703.
Added the Portal SQL Cleanup for Deploying a New Release task to the Deploy inBloom Applications: Portal section. See DE2667.
Updated the examples in the inBloom REST API Example Walk Through: Recording Grades for a Quiz by replacing studentId and sectionID with studentSectionAssociationId. See DE2640.
Updated ingestion index validation deployment information. See DE2723.
Copy editing to improve readability in some sections.
Updated and clarified information throughout the MongoDB section.
Added deployment section for the bulk extract service.
Added section in the bulk extract deployment chapter to cover additional tasks required when deploying REST API updates.

Added new information for bulk extract data encryption. Two new sections:
Update the Tomcat Configuration for Bulk Extract Encryption
Adding Certificates to the inBloom Truststore

Added new sli.properties entries to the bulk extract deployment, which control how bulk extract operations read from the MongoDB data store. Update included pulling parameters list into its own section, linked from the setup procedure.
Added section in the bulk extract deployment chapter to cover a required database update when deleting individual bulk extract files.
Added instructions for E2E testing of bulk extract applications. Removed old properties and steps that are no longer needed for E2E testing.
Added resolution information for segmentation faults from the search indexer.
Added instructions and supporting information in the bulk extract deployment section for using a cleanup script to delete specific bulk extract files.

For changes related to removing the staging database from the ingestion subsystem: updated list of REST API and ingestion SLI properties in their respective deployment sections, removed staging database resources from the planning chapter, and updated the architecture diagram.
Added "developer_realm" value to the acceptance tests properties.
Security event logs table now includes the events associated with the bulk extract feature.
Added warning that the TLS connection for bulk extract endpoints must propagate all the way to the API/bulk extract node and must not terminate at the load balancer/nginx.
No changes were made during this release.
Added a note in the section about security even logs to draw attention to the securityEvents resources in the REST API. Also cleaned up the table covering what security events are logged.
Made several additions to the properties.yml configuration file in support of generic edorg E2E tests in RC. Also added note regarding need to import ldif file for Charter School scenarios.
Updated SecurityEvents API call documentation to refer to updated Developer Guide. Updated the descriptions of Logged Events.
Bulk extract documentation update.
Removed mention of targetEdOrg.
Updated references to Ruby version to 1.9.2-p320 from 1.9.2-p290.
Added a new section in the Generate Cryptographic Keys, Keystores, and Truststores chapter to describe the setup for an API keystore.
Added API keystore properties.
Updated references to Ruby version 1.9.3-p448 from 1.9.2-p320.
Added a new section to run Bulk Extract Tests in Sandbox Mode.
Added a new section for removing certificates from the inBloom truststore.
Update API Configuration section to remove ambiguity around usage of encryption tool.
Update E2E Tests section to clarify what properties are needed to run bulk extract.
Update API Configuration section to include search engine query limits.
No changes were made during this release.
Updated references to Ruby version 2.0.0-p353 from 1.9.3-p448.
